Portfolio

I code the bridge between aesthetics and functionality.

Over mij

Hi! I’m Glen, a passionate web developer currently studying Applied Informatics at Artevelde University of Applied Sciences in Ghent. I specialize in front-end development, with a particular love for creating visually appealing and interactive websites that offer seamless user experiences. My tools of choice include JavaScript, HTML, CSS, PHP, SQL, and I enjoy working with frameworks like Laravel and animation libraries like GSAP.

I’ve had the opportunity to work on a variety of projects, ranging from a web app for music groups to arrange seating plans, to a fitness community platform where users can create and review workouts. I’ve also built an API-driven info site for a festival and recreated a website of the month featuring dynamic animations. These projects have not only sharpened my technical skills but also fueled my creativity and problem-solving abilities.

While my heart lies in front-end development, where I focus on both UI and UX design, I’m also well-versed in back-end technologies and strive to grow as a full-stack developer. Currently, I’m deepening my knowledge of database management and constantly learning new animation techniques to keep my work engaging and innovative.

I thrive on challenges, love learning new things, and I’m always looking for opportunities to collaborate and grow. Whether it’s working in a team or independently, I’m adaptable, open to feedback, and driven by a desire to deliver high-quality results. My ultimate goal is to build not just functional websites, but digital experiences that leave a lasting impact.

Let’s create something amazing together!
